Observed at: North East Margaree 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 12 April 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 99.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: 1.3°C
Wind: SW 6 km/h

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 9 except plus 5 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High 9 except plus 5 along parts of the coast. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the evening then northwest 30 gusting to 60 overnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 12 April 2023
